casebody.data:
Mark Despres
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2016

April E. Brodeur, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Lawrence J. Tytla, supervisory assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Mark Despres' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 572, 142 A.3d 400 (2016), is denied.
